package week1.day1;

import java.time.Duration;

import org.openqa.selenium.By;
import org.openqa.selenium.Point;
import org.openqa.selenium.Dimension;
import org.openqa.selenium.WebElement;
import org.openqa.selenium.chrome.ChromeDriver;

public class LeafgroundbuttonAssi {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
ChromeDriver driver=new ChromeDriver();
driver.manage().window().maximize();
driver.manage().timeouts().implicitlyWait(Duration.ofSeconds(30));
driver.get("https://leafground.com/button.xhtml");
driver.findElement(By.xpath("//span[text()='Click']")).click();

String title = driver.getTitle();
System.out.println("The titile of the page :"+title);
String orgtitle="Dashboard";
if(title.equals(orgtitle))
{
	System.out.println("Success");
}
else
{
	System.out.println("Failure");
}
driver.navigate().back();
boolean isenabled=driver.findElement(By.xpath("//button[contains(@class,'ui-state-disabled')]")).isEnabled();
System.out.println("Check the button is enabled or not :"+isenabled);

Point location = driver.findElement(By.xpath("//span[text()='Submit']")).getLocation();

System.out.println("the position of x is:"+location.getX() +"the positon of y is:" +location.getY());

WebElement button=driver.findElement(By.xpath("//span[text()='Save']"));
String color=button.getCssValue("color");
System.out.println("The save button color is"+color);
Dimension size = driver.findElement(By.xpath("(//span[text()='Submit'])[2]")).getSize();
System.out.println("the height of the button is :"+size.height +"," +"the width of the button is:" +size.width);;

driver.close();
	}

}
